Lindsey: UI/UX
Marco: Technical Content
Trevor: Approver / Visionary
Heather: Help and Feedback
Possible name change?
Training should be simple and achievable.
Troubleshooting maybe a secondary focus.
April 2nd: Finalize a Layout and what cpontent should belong and go where to identify content needed for Lindsey
April 17th: Lindseys input on layout reign in on content.
April 22nd: Review Meeting hopefully finalize layout design.
Make regular progress updates to the team in case there are question areas. Open room.
